titleStmt.title: H.W. Hull v. Washington Territory. Return of petitioner

bibl.title: H.W. Hull v. Washington Territory. Return of Petitioner.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.ab: Office of the Sheriff of King County W.T. | ss.
div1.p: I JH McGraw, Sheriff of King County W.T. do hereby return to the Hon. R.S. Greene, Judge of the District Court holding terms at Seattle that herefore the to me of the annexed with the said H.W. Hull, was committed to my custody, and is detained by virtue of a certified copy of recongizance duly included into, in said Court by the said H>W. Hull and the in said recongizance named, said Certified copy of recongizance + a copy thereof thereto annexed is herewith produced; nevertheless I have the body of the said H. W. Hull beofre you on the day and place in said writ named as I am therein commanded.
div1.ab: Dated at Seattle the 21st day of April 1884.
Territory of Washington COunty of King | ss.

Subscribed and sworn
to before me this 21st day of April 1884
Sheriff Fees: Bringing up Deft 1.00 Copy 1.00 Travel .20 Return 50 $2.70
